00031 LiveFileTracker::LiveFileTracker(const TableIdentifier *identifier,
00032                                  SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00033                                  const RangeSpec *range,
00034                                  const String &ag_name) :
00035   m_identifier(*identifier), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr),
00036   m_start_row(range->start_row), m_end_row(range->end_row),
00037   m_ag_name(ag_name), m_need_update(false), m_is_root(false) {
00038 
00039   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0
00040                && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00041 }

00044 void LiveFileTracker::add_references(const std::vector<String> &filev) {
00045   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00046   FileRefCountMap::iterator iter;
00047   for (size_t i=0; i<filev.size(); i++) {
00048     iter = m_referenced.find(filev[i]);
00049     if (iter == m_referenced.end())
00050       m_referenced[filev[i]] = 1;
00051     else
00052       (*iter).second++;
00053   }
00054 }
00055 
00061 void LiveFileTracker::remove_references(const std::vector<String> &filev) {
00062   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00063   FileRefCountMap::iterator iter;
00064   for (size_t i=0; i<filev.size(); i++) {
00065     iter = m_referenced.find(filev[i]);
00066     HT_ASSERT(iter != m_referenced.end());
00067     if (--(*iter).second == 0) {
00068       m_referenced.erase(iter);
00069       if (m_blocked.count(filev[i]) > 0)
00070         m_need_update = true;
00071     }
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 void LiveFileTracker::update_files_column() {
00077 
00078   if (!m_need_update)
00079     return;
00080 
00081   String file_list;
00082   String end_row;
00083 
00084   m_mutex.lock();
00085 
00086   foreach(const String &file, m_live)
00087     file_list += file + ";\n";
00088 
00089   m_blocked.clear();
00090   foreach(const FileRefCountMap::value_type &v, m_referenced) {
00091     if (m_live.count(v.first) == 0) {
00092       file_list += format("#%s;\n", v.first.c_str());
00093       m_blocked.insert(v.first);
00094     }
00095   }
00096 
00097   end_row = m_end_row;
00098 
00099   m_update_mutex.lock();
00100   m_mutex.unlock();
00101 
00102   try {
00103     if (m_is_root) {
00104       MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema_ptr);
00105       metadata.write_files(m_ag_name, file_list);
00106     }
00107     else {
00108       MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, end_row);
00109       metadata.write_files(m_ag_name, file_list);
00110     }
00111   }
00112   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00113     m_update_mutex.unlock();
00114     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Problem updating 'Files' column of METADATA: "
00115                  << e << HT_END;
00116     HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "Problem updating 'Files' column of METADATA: ");
00117   }
00118 
00119   m_need_update = false;
00120   m_update_mutex.unlock();
00121 
00122 }
00123

00125 void LiveFileTracker::get_file_list(String &file_list, bool include_blocked) {
00126   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00127 
00128   file_list = "";
00129 
00130   foreach(const String &file, m_live)
00131     file_list += file + ";\n";
00132 
00133   if (include_blocked) {
00134     m_blocked.clear();
00135     foreach(const FileRefCountMap::value_type &v, m_referenced) {
00136       if (m_live.count(v.first) == 0) {
00137         file_list += format("#%s;\n", v.first.c_str());
00138         m_blocked.insert(v.first);
00139       }
00140     }
00141   }
00142 
00143 }
